name: Kenya Arabica Premium
description: A vibrant and highly aromatic coffee with bright citrus flavors.

name: Ethiopian Highland Robusta
description: Robust and bold, with a pronounced earthy flavor and a hint of spices.

name: Rwandan Excelsa Blend
description: A delicate floral aroma with a unique and complex flavor profile.

name: Malawi Mountain Liberica
description: A rare Liberica variety offering a distinctly bold nutty flavor.

name: Tanzania Peaberry Arabica
description: Rich and smooth, with deep velvety chocolate notes.

name: Kenyan Robusta Deluxe
description: Full-bodied coffee with rich earthy flavors and a spicy finish.

name: Ethiopian Sidamo
description: Smooth and fragrant with subtle floral notes and a hint of berries.

name: Rwandan Liberica Essence
description: Earthy tones complemented by a rich nutty flavor make this a memorable coffee.

name: Malawi Gold Arabica
description: Golden beans produce a sweet, fruity cup with a bright, crisp finish.

name: Tanzanian Robusta Strong
description: A potent brew with deep earthy notes and a robust flavor.

name: Ethiopian Excelsa Treasure
description: An exquisite blend that offers a floral aroma balanced with sweet and tangy notes.

name: Rwandan Cherry Arabica
description: Sweet cherry flavor with a hint of tartness, producing a lively cup of coffee.

name: Malawian Excelsa Special
description: Unique chocolatey undertones with a smooth finish, perfect for any time of day.

name: Tanzanian Liberica Classic
description: Classic Liberica beans with a strong, distinctive nutty flavor that's boldly satisfying.
